summary: This document is an email exchange regarding viewership numbers for the ABC News special 'Truth and Lies: Jeffrey Epstein', which aired on January 9, 2020. It shows the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York monitoring media coverage related to the Epstein case.

events.title: ABC News Special 'Truth and Lies: Jeffrey Epstein' Airs
events.description: The ABC News investigative special 'Truth and Lies: Jeffrey Epstein' aired and received approximately 3.5 million viewers.

keyFacts: The ABC News special 'Truth and Lies: Jeffrey Epstein' aired on or around January 9, 2020.
The special received approximately 3.5 million viewers.
The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was monitoring media coverage related to the Epstein case in January 2020.
